MetaData.Description: Most APSIM crop or plant modules do not require extra user input. Crop specific parameters are either provided for your chosen soil, or are captured as part of the standard model validation process. NOTE THIS MODULE IS A PROTOTYPE ONLY.

ShootLag.description: Thermal time lag before linear sprout growth starts (deg days)
